duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain software applications using Vue.js, PHP, and MySQL within an enterprise-level LAMP stack environment.
Design and develop APIs and integrations for software applications, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Work with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces.
Utilize Amazon Web Services (AWS) to optimize application performance and reliability.
Collaborate with a cross-functional team to design and implement software architecture and development best practices.
Adhere to Agile principles and processes for iterative and efficient software development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
